languages.text: Руины некогда великого улья молча проводили последний челнок, рассекший темное небо Гордости Сантиэля. Подрывные заряды, забуренные в кору обледенелого мира, вызвали цепную реакцию в залежах прометия и раскололи планету на куски.

traits.locale_text: Руины некогда великого улья молча проводили последний челнок, рассекший темное небо Гордости Сантиэля. Подрывные заряды, забуренные в кору обледенелого мира, вызвали цепную реакцию в залежах прометиума и раскололи планету на куски.

languages.text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.
languages.original_text: Руины некогда великого улья молча проводили последний челнок, рассекший темное небо Гордости Сантиэля. Подрывные заряды, забуренные в кору обледенелого мира, вызвали цепную реакцию в залежах прометия и раскололи планету на куски.

traits.locale_text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle to cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

The survivors of the world's once proud population are lifted onto the Rogue Trader's voidship and ready to set off in search of a new home. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

languages.text: Les ruines de la ruche autrefois florissante lancent un ultime adieu à la dernière navette qui fendra le ciel de la Gloire de Santiel. Des charges explosives, placées sous le manteau de la planète glacée de manière à déclencher une réaction en chaîne avec les dépôts souterrains de prométhium, la firent imploser en plusieurs fragments.
languages.original_text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

traits.locale_text: Les ruines de la ruche autrefois florissante lancent un ultime adieu à la dernière navette qui fendra le ciel de la Gloire de Santiel. Des charges explosives, placées sous le manteau de la planète glacée de manière à déclencher une réaction en chaîne avec les dépôts souterrains de prométhium, la firent imploser en plusieurs fragments.

languages.text: 最后一架穿梭机离开了这座一度伟大的巢都，划过阴暗的天空，向它无声地告别。无数炸药埋入了这个冰雪世界的地壳中，在钷素矿床中引发了连锁反应，将这颗行星炸成了碎片。
languages.original_text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

traits.locale_text: 最后一架穿梭机离开了这座一度伟大的巢都，划过阴暗的天空，向它无声地告别。无数炸药埋入了这个冰雪世界的地壳中，在钷素矿床中引发了连锁反应，将这颗行星炸成了碎片。

languages.text: Die Ruinen der einst großen Makropole blickten stumm dem letzten Shuttle hinterher, das je am dunklen Himmel über Santiels Stolz fliegen sollte. Sprengladungen waren in die Kruste der Eiswelt gebohrt worden und lösten nun eine Kettenreaktion in den Promethium-Vorkommen aus, welche den Planeten in Stücke riss.
languages.original_text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

traits.locale_text: Die Ruinen der einst großen Makropole blickten stumm dem letzten Shuttle hinterher, das je am dunklen Himmel über Santiels Stolz fliegen sollte. Sprengladungen waren in die Kruste der Eiswelt gebohrt worden und lösten nun eine Kettenreaktion in den Promethium-Vorkommen aus, welche den Planeten in Stücke riss.

languages.text: Las ruinas de la otrora grandiosa colmena despidieron en silencio a la última lanzadera que cruzará los oscuros cielos de Orgullo de Santiel. Las cargas explosivas, incrustadas en la superficie de este gélido mundo, desencadenaron una reacción en cadena en los depósitos de prometio e hicieron pedazos el planeta.
languages.original_text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

traits.locale_text: Las ruinas de la otrora grandiosa colmena despidieron en silencio a la última lanzadera que cruzará los oscuros cielos de Orgullo de Santiel. Las cargas explosivas, incrustadas en la superficie de este gélido mundo, desencadenaron una reacción en cadena en los depósitos de prometio e hicieron pedazos el planeta.

languages.text: かつて立派だった多層都市は廃墟になって、サンティエル・プライドの暗い空を飛ぶ最後のシャトルに静かに別れを告げた。その氷の惑星の地殻に打ち込まれた爆薬がプロメチウム鉱床で連鎖反応を起こし、惑星は木っ端微塵になってしまった。
languages.original_text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.

traits.locale_text: かつて立派だった多層都市は廃墟になって、サンティエル・プライドの暗い空を飛ぶ最後のシャトルに静かに別れを告げた。その氷の惑星の地殻に打ち込まれた爆薬がプロメチウム鉱床で連鎖反応を起こし、惑星は木っ端微塵になってしまった。

languages.text: Bir zamanların kudretli kovanı Santiel'in Gururu, karanlık göğünden geçen son mekiğe de sessizce veda etti. Buzul dünyanın kabuğu delinip içine patlayıcılar yerleştirildi, prometyum yataklarında zincirleme bir reaksiyon tetiklendi ve gezegen parçalarına ayrıldı.
languages.original_text: The ruins of the once-great hive bade a silent farewell to the last shuttle that will ever cross the dark skies over Santiel's Pride. Explosive charges, drilled into the crust of the icy world, set off a chain reaction in the promethium deposits and shattered the planet into pieces.
